short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Solve the quizzes with a little hint!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will help you to solve quizzes, tests, etc. All you need is prepare file with answers, and upload it to extension. Then just highlight question on the page, and you will see answer in left bottom corner of the screen. Enjoy!

Tests answers added by default: LinkedIn(Git, Agile, JSON, MongoDB), logical thinking test.
